import { IonMenu, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonList, IonListHeader, IonNote, IonMenuToggle, IonItem, IonLabel, IonButton, IonButtons, IonCol, IonGrid, IonInput, IonMenuButton, IonPage, IonRouterOutlet, IonRow, IonSplitPane, IonCard, IonCardTitle, IonAccordion, IonAccordionGroup, } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router"; import { Redirect, Route, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import Course from '../admin/quiz/Course'; import baseUrl, { api } from '../../pages/Urls'; const ViewCourse: React.FC = () => { type ViewCourse = { id: string; }; const history = useHistory() const location = useLocation() const { id } = useParams(); const [course_name, setCourse_name] = useState(''); const [quiz, setQuiz] = useState([]); const [topic, setTopic] = useState([]); const [topic_name, setTopic_name] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${baseUrl}${api.showCourse}${id}`, { method: 'GET', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}` } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(result => { setCourse_name(result.course.course_name) setQuiz(result.course.quiz) setTopic(result.course.topic) }) }, []); return ( <> Course Name: {course_name} Topic
topic Name setTopic_name(e.target.value)} clearInput>
Quiz
Topic Name:
Level Question Quiz Attempt My Course List My Course ); } const TemporaryHeader: React.FC<{ course_name: string }> = (props) => { return ( {props.course_name} ); }; const List: React.FC<{ quiz: any[], topic: any[] }> = (props) => { return ( <> Quiz
{props.quiz.map((item: any, i: any) =>

{item.quiz_name}

)}
{props.topic.map((item: any, i: any) => {item.topic_name}
Topic Name: {item.topic_name}
)} ); }; export default ViewCourse;
